metadata.title: CVE-2014-8360 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Directory traversal vulnerability in inc/autoload.function.php in GLPIbefore 0.84.8 allows remote attackers to include and execute arbitrarylocal files via a .._ (dot dot underscore) in an item type to thegetItemForItemtype, as demonstrated by the itemtype parameter inajax/common.tabs.php.

criterions.comment: glpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
